'''Amethyst Lump''' is a [[Forging Material]] item exclusively found in [[Inazuma]], harvested by breaking '''Violet Crystals'''.<ref>Event: [[Graph Adversarial Technology Experiment Log]] Day 5</ref> Like [[Crystal Chunk]]s, they can be used for [[forging]] [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]]. They are also used in forging [[weapons]] from the [[Amethyst Series]].

==How to Obtain==
Amethyst Lump can be mined only in [[Inazuma]]. See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=202 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

They can be harvested by attacking Violet Crystal nodes, dropping 1-3 Amethyst Lumps each. Like all {{Geo}} objects, it is faster to destroy them using [[Blunt Attack]]s. Their respawn rate is 72 hours.

In [[Co-Op Mode]], each nearby player will get their own drops with amounts randomized separately and players will not be able to see others' drops. Unlike most [[Materials]], they cannot be affected by {{Anemo}} abilities that may move them.
